text: @amazon Why isn't there an app for Roboform? Very frustrated to find out I can't use Roboform on my new Kindle Fire 10.

@amazon @AmazonHelp our Fire Stick won’t play Netflix, it will launch the app, play a show for about a minute, then say there was an error. It’s not our Netflix account because our tv is a smart tv and will play Netflix without a problem and our other stick works. Any ideas?

@amazon just read you employ people to transcribe customer conversations with Alexa.  1st not surprised, 2nd the fix that customers opt out in the app is ridiculous.  The correct answer is: we will change our policy, the default is “opt out” that customers must manually opt in!
